snippet: Ahead of the church’s annual lobbying day in Albany, Timothy M. Dolan told an audience that Catholics needed to make their voices heard more clearly.
abstract: New York Cardinal Timothy M Dolan tells Roman Catholics that in an era when the church is fighting the government on several fronts, they need to make their voices heard more clearly in the political sphere; speech comes in advance of the church's annual lobbying day in Albany, NY.

byline.original: By TIM STELLOH and ANDY NEWMAN

lead_paragraph: Ahead of the church’s annual lobbying day in Albany, Timothy M. Dolan told an audience that Catholics needed to make their voices heard more clearly.

headline.seo: Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan Urges Catholics to Become More Politically Active
headline.main: Dolan Urges Catholics to Become More Active in Politics
